title: Orbea Terra carbon  gravel bike redesigned from the ground up for adventure
content:
Orbeaâ€™s new carbon Terra gravel bike is a complete redesign of a bike that had its early origins in cyclocross, but is now more specifically suited for long and fast mixed-surface adventure in its latest iteration. With gravel riding having evolved dramatically since we first glimpsed the previous Terra gravel prototype, Orbea felt it was
